WorkflowInfo.Name: JSON Parsing Example
WorkflowInfo.Description: Returns a table of all the values under the specified key path
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" x:Name="CustomWorkflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <StartJsonSession x:Name="startJsonSession1" id="464" name="StartJsonSession" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Start Json Session" Description="Start Json Session" JsonString="{ "store": {
 "book": [ 
 { "category": "reference",
 "author": "Nigel Rees",
 "title": "Sayings of the Century",
 "price": 8.95
 },
 { "category": "fiction",
 "author": "Evelyn Waugh",
 "title": "Sword of Honour",
 "price": 12.99
 },
 { "category": "fiction",
 "author": "Herman Melville",
 "title": "Moby Dick",
 "isbn": "0-553-21311-3",
 "price": 8.99
 },
 { "category": "fiction",
 "author": "J. R. R. Tolkien",
 "title": "The Lord of the Rings",
 "isbn": "0-395-19395-8",
 "price": 22.99
 }
 ],
 "bicycle": {
 "color": "red",
 "price": 19.95
 }
 }
}" HostId="0" HostName="{x:Null}" StartSession="XML" Password="{x:Null}" UserName="{x:Null}" TypeName="StartJsonSession" /> <JsonGetKeyPaths x:Name="jsonGetKeyPaths1" id="462" name="JsonGetKeyPaths" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Get Json Key Paths" Description="Json Get Key Paths" SessionName="startJsonSession1" Key="category" HostId="0" HostName="{x:Null}" TypeName="JsonGetKeyPaths" /> <JsonToTable x:Name="jsonToTable1" id="463" name="JsonToTable" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Json To Table" Description="Json To Table" SessionName="startJsonSession1" KeyPath=".store.book" HostId="0" HostName="{x:Null}" TypeName="JsonToTable" /> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
